Articles.Content:
I have no idea what is causing this, but I bet someone out there knows exactly what is.

When I switch to a vessel from the map or from the Tracking Center my ship displays then quickly disappears.  My altitude is blank and as soon as I try to leave the game crashes.  Here is the log:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/t5onsjxtsurkldr/KSP.log?dl=0

Thanks in advance,

  Probus
I have experienced this myself with a handful of "dead" crafts I cannot interact with in any manner but sadly I do not know a fix.
